prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, Strings, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Pipe, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, and Strings, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Pipe, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, and Strings, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This composition consists of Pipe, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums
